General.Name: Acom Co. Ltd
General.Description: Acom Co., Ltd. offers loans, credit cards, and loan guarantee services in Japan and internationally. The company operates through four segments: Loan and Credit Card Business, Guarantee Business, Overseas Financial Business, and Loan Servicing Business. It also provides installment and unsecured loan, money lending, embedded finance, and guarantee services. In addition, the company offers contracting services at the contact center; and temporary personnel services. Acom Co., Ltd. was founded in 1936 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
General.Address: Meiji Yasuda Seimei Building, Tokyo, Japan, 100-8307
